content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
My boss streches us so thin. He asks everyone to work overtime.
I hear you on that. It seems like your boss is a toxic boss and wants everyone to work overtime. What have you done to make yourself feel better about your job?
I tired to think about the positive side of my job. It is at least well-paid.
It is great that you have someone who appreciates your hard work and wants you to do well, even if it is just to make it go away.
